import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const Checkout = ({}) => { const carts = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('carts')); let total = 0; for (let i = 0; i < carts.length; i++) { total += (carts[i].price * carts[i].quantity) } return (
Home / Cart / Checkout

Billing Details

Your Order

{carts.map((product) => ( ))}
Product Total
{product.name}x {product.quantity} ${product.price * product.quantity}
Cart Subtotal ${total}
Order Total ${total}
{/* */}
) } Checkout.propTypes = { } export default Checkout
